training.student_unit: Gendarmerie Training Division at Joint Staff
38 participants attended the CCMR Seminar in Dakar. 12 were civilian and 26 military personnel. Representatives from Senegal, Benin, The Gambia, Chad, Togo and Mauritania participated in the seminar.

27 students participated to the DIILS Seminar; 3 were from the Presidency Staff, 1 was from the National Assembly, 1 was from the University, 3 were from the Ministry of Economy and Finance, 1 was from the Ministry of the Armed Forces, 3 were from the Ministry of Interior, 1 was from the Ministry of Justice, 1 was from the Press, 2 were from the Civil Organizations, 4 were from the Armed Forces Headquarters, 5 were from the Gendarmerie Headquarters, 1 was from the Attorney General's Office.
25 students were trained; 3 were from the Engineer BN, 17 were from the Navy Technical Support Division, 3 were from Navy OPS, 2 were from Navy Logistics Division
Material BN. Three students came from the Engineer BN
